examples.example: 私营企业为社会经济的发展做出了很大贡献。

translate.english: Private enterprises have made great contributions to the development of the social economy.

examples.example: 很多私营店铺凭借优质的服务和良好的口碑吸引了大量顾客。

translate.english: Many private shops have attracted a large number of customers by virtue of high-quality services and good reputations.

examples.example: 如今有许多有活力的私营公司，为人们提供了多样的就业机会。

translate.english: Nowadays there are many dynamic private companies that provide people with diverse employment opportunities.
